%%% CONFIGURATION %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\renewcommand{\mythesis}{\mastersthesis}

% Meta data in the PDF file.
\hypersetup{
	pdfauthor={\myname},
	pdftitle={\mytitle},
	pdfsubject={\mytitle},
	pdfkeywords={Thesis, Template, LaTeX, Geometry, Circles}  % Some relevant keywords of your choice.
}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%% DOCUMENT %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
\begin{document}

% Set the content language.  Default language is "english".  If you want to
% write your thesis in German, use "ngerman" instead.
\selectlanguage{ngerman}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%% FRONT MATTER %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
\frontmatter

\maketitle
\cleardoublepage

\makedeclaration
\cleardoublepage

\input{front/abstract_de.tex}
\cleardoublepage

\iflanguage{english}{%
    \input{front/abstract_en.tex}%
    \cleardoublepage%
}{}

\tableofcontents
\cleardoublepage

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%%   MAIN MATTER   %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
\mainmatter

\input{main/introduction.tex}
\cleardoublepage

\input{main/fundamentals.tex}
\cleardoublepage

\input{main/related_work.tex}
\cleardoublepage

% This is one example content chapter.  Add more if needed.
\input{main/example_content_chapter.tex}
\cleardoublepage

\input{main/evaluation.tex}
\cleardoublepage

\input{main/conclusion_future_work.tex}
\cleardoublepage

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%%   BACK MATTER   %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
\backmatter

\iflanguage{english}{%
    \bibliographystyle{abbrvnat}%
}{%
    \bibliographystyle{dinat}%
}
\bibliography{bibliography}
\cleardoublepage
